body: Not usually a fan of mind control but I love how she is completely aware throughout this  and displays such displeasure. The stick scenes cracks me up everything time I read this.
Hace you seen evangelion Argus ? Asuka And reí are constantly reminded they are dolls trought they series, Thats why they are shown as dolls un the cover

I find it kind of funny that a lot cover pages of this artist's works feature a woman being recorded with a phone, but when you look at the screen, she looks like one of those tiny model figurines you'd see in an art class.
